member_organisations: All our affiliates are included in our website: www.knoell.de
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Environment, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Only technical guidance documents and implementing regulations under the framework of chemicals, plant protection/fertilizers, food and animal feed and animal health.
relevant_communication: None. Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH is a scientific regulatory consultancy and it only produces technical publications at specialized scientific conferences.
goals__remit: Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH is a scientific regulatory consultancy providing services to the private sector in the areas of risk-assessement and technical support for product registration. Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH is a private and for-profit organization (family own) headquarted in Germany and opperating accross several countries in Europe and beyond. Our remit is to provide high-quality dossiers and risk-assessment for product Registration accross different regulatory Frameworks: chemicals, agriculture, medical devices, animal health. Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH supports all technical and scientific aspects during the registration process of chemicals (and other products) in several regions: Europe, Americas, Asia and Africa.
